Articles.Content: Banned for not having a location, therefore making me assume that you are a higher dimensional being to which the universe is a speck and yet you still can ocupy 3D space, making you be everywhere and nowhere at once.
Banned for not knowing how to use a duct tape, Jebediah way, and saying you're him.
Banned because I never did say that I did not use Duct Tape the Jebidiah way.

Banned for writing "Jebediah" wrong

Wait a minute....

Why your post count never changes?

lol I don't remember your last amount of posts!

But I think it was 16 before this post....

EDIT: Your post count is wrong!!! Banned twice!
Banned for double-posting and worrying about post count.
Banned for banning me for banning someone for having a wrong post count!
Banned for posting outside the forum games 338 times.
Banned because your post count is wrong too! I blame the Kraken, but you are still banned.
You are now banned for exploding rockets and HAVING A WRONG POST COUNT!!!?@?Q!?!??!
Banned for criticising the servers post counting mechanisms!!

Banned for criticizing someone who is criticizing the post counting mechanisms!

That's an unacceptable violation!
You are banned for life without parole and you might receive the forum account death penalty.

Again, banned for your post counting being wrong

Edited February 25, 2014 by EuSouONumero345

Banned for not having a post count over 9000!

Banned for not having a location, therefore making me assume that you are a higher dimensional being to which the universe is a speck and yet you still can ocupy 3D space, making you be everywhere and nowhere at once.

Who says I'm not?
Banned for possibly being a 6+ dimensional entity.

Banned because we all may be living in a Matrix-like computer system, all of us being very complex algorithms who apparently have nothing better to do than fake-ban each other for random, stupid reasons all day long.

In the fields of Trenzalore, in the fall of dragonth, a banning request will be made, a banning request that must never ever be made!

Trenzalore where? Trenzalore where

Banned for speculating about Trenzalore
Banned for pixel art.
Banned for illegal usage of the forbidden Duct Tape!
Banned because science
Banned for..... Reasons.
Banned for being "that noob"
Banned for not being a spacecraft engineer
Banned for being on Planet X.
Banned for wrong post count
